channel.title: Gfx
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to make a gfx work from an npc to player.
Like a magic gfx where it is the gfx and follows you etc.. But for an npc so that the gfx comes from the npc and folows the player. Not the gfx where it just does the gfx on your body.
